metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000206 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: samtools htslib library version 1.4.0 and earlier is vulnerable to bufferoverflow in the CRAM rANS codec resulting in potential arbitrary codeexecution

criterions.comment: htslib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
